cappucino.description: Delight in the creamy sweetness of white chocolate combined with frothy cappuccino foam.

espresso.title: Classic Shot

espresso.title: Double
espresso.subTitle: Twice the Intensity

espresso.subTitle: Espresso 'Stained' with a Dash of Milk
espresso.description: Enjoy the perfect balance of espresso and milk in our espresso macchiato, a delightful treat for espresso lovers.

espresso.subTitle: Chilled Espresso Perfection
espresso.description: Cool down with our refreshing iced espresso, perfect for those hot summer days.

espresso.description: Indulge in the richness of our espresso con panna, topped with a dollop of freshly whipped cream.

espresso.subTitle: Espresso with a Twist of Lemon
espresso.description: Experience a unique flavor combination with our espresso romano, featuring a refreshing twist of lemon.

espresso.subTitle: Longer Brewed Espresso
espresso.description: Savor the smoothness of our espresso lungo, brewed slightly longer for a milder flavor profile.

espresso.title: Affogato
espresso.subTitle: Espresso 'Drowned' in Gelato
espresso.description: Indulge in the delightful combination of espresso and gelato with our espresso affogato.

espresso.subTitle: Espresso Cocktail with Vodka

espresso.title: Tonic
espresso.subTitle: Espresso with Tonic Water
espresso.description: Discover a unique flavor combination with our espresso tonic, featuring the bitterness of espresso paired with the effervescence of tonic water.
